value.description: GitHub Issues Backlog panel by Bitergia
value.panelsJSON: [{"id": "github_issues_openissues_statistics", "type": "visualization", "title": "Open Issues Statistics", "version": "6.1.0-3", "gridData": {"h": 2, "x": 0, "w": 7, "i": "1", "y": 0}, "panelIndex": "1"}, {"id": "github_issues_backlog_waiting_to_be_closed", "type": "visualization", "title": "Backlog", "version": "6.1.0-3", "gridData": {"h": 2, "x": 7, "w": 5, "i": "18", "y": 0}, "panelIndex": "18"}, {"id": "github_issues_backlog_submitters", "type": "visualization", "title": "Backlog Submitters", "version": "6.1.0-3", "gridData": {"h": 7, "x": 0, "w": 4, "i": "19", "y": 8}, "panelIndex": "19"}, {"id": "github_issues_backlog", "type": "visualization", "title": "Backlog (Open Issues)", "version": "6.1.0-3", "gridData": {"h": 6, "x": 0, "w": 7, "i": "20", "y": 2}, "panelIndex": "20"}, {"id": "github_issues_backlog_waiting_to_be_closed_accumulated_time", "type": "visualization", "title": "Backlog: Issues (Accumulated Time)", "version": "6.1.0-3", "gridData": {"h": 2, "x": 7, "w": 5, "i": "21", "y": 2}, "panelIndex": "21"}, {"id": "github_issues_open_organizations", "type": "visualization", "title": "Organizations", "version": "6.1.0-3", "gridData": {"h": 4, "x": 7, "w": 5, "i": "22", "y": 4}, "panelIndex": "22"}, {"id": "github_issues_organizations_backlog", "type": "visualization", "title": "Organizations", "version": "6.1.0-3", "gridData": {"h": 7, "x": 4, "w": 4, "i": "23", "y": 8}, "panelIndex": "23"}, {"id": "github_issues_projects_backlog", "type": "visualization", "title": "Projects", "version": "6.1.0-3", "gridData": {"h": 7, "x": 8, "w": 4, "i": "24", "y": 8}, "panelIndex": "24"}]

value.visState: {"title":"github_issues_openissues_statistics","type":"metric","params":{"fontSize":"12","metric":{"percentageMode":false,"useRanges":false,"colorSchema":"Green to Red","metricColorMode":"None","colorsRange":[{"from":0,"to":10000}],"labels":{"show":true},"invertColors":false,"style":{"bgFill":"#000","bgColor":false,"labelColor":false,"subText":"","fontSize":"12"}},"addTooltip":true,"addLegend":false,"type":"metric"},"aggs":[{"id":"1","enabled":true,"type":"count","schema":"metric","params":{"customLabel":"Open Issues"}},{"id":"2","enabled":true,"type":"sum","schema":"metric","params":{"field":"time_open_days","customLabel":"Accumulated Open Days"}},{"id":"3","enabled":true,"type":"avg","schema":"metric","params":{"field":"painless_delay","customLabel":"Average Time Open per Issue"}}]}
